title: Understanding the VIP Dashboard
subtitle: Get started on your journey to homeownership by creating your BALL account.

steps.title: The Navigation Bar
steps.description: Familiarize yourself with the navigation bar. It includes essential features like the application tour, notification icon, company logo, and additional menu options.

steps.title: Tour the Application
steps.description: Take a quick tour of the application to understand its features and layout.

steps.title: The SideBar
steps.description: The sidebar contains links to manage your account, including accessing various sections and features.

steps.title: The Quick Access Cards
steps.description: The quick access cards provide a snapshot of your account, displaying key information like transactions, properties, services, and more.

steps.title: The Notification Cards
steps.description: Notification cards provide important information and alerts to help you take timely action on your account.

note.text: Some of the notification cards might be hidden if they don't have any notifications to display.

steps.title: Learn About the Page
steps.description: This section provides detailed information about the current page and its functionalities.
